msContents.summary: Martyrdom of St. Viktor the General; unrelated fragments

msItemStruct.note: Mounted in 5 frames, 5000:1-5 qua; additional unplaced fragments set aside for conservation

physDesc.p: 9 fragments; (1) 25 x 34 mm, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) 2 lines (?), top margin, (2) 48 x 19 mm, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) 4 lines, top margin, (3) 53 x 52 mm, (A) 4 lines, top right margins, (B) 5 lines, top margin, (4) 39 x 29 mm, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, no margins, (5) 41 x 48 mm, (A) 2 cols., (col.i) 7 lines, right margin, (col.ii) 5 lines, left margin, (B) 2 cols., (col.i) 4 lines, right margin, (col.ii) 6 lines, left margin, (6) 56 x 35 lines, (A) 8 lines, right margin, (B) 8 lines, left margin, (7) 35 x 19 mm, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (8) 25 x 27 mm, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, right margin, (9) 71 x 40 mm, (A) 5 lines, bottom right margins, (B) 3 lines, bottom left margins
